snippet: Efforts are under way to expand affective programming, a way of teaching computers to recognize emotions through analyzing facial expressions.
abstract: Efforts are under way to expand affective programming, a way of teaching computers to recognize emotions by analyzing facial expressions; some researchers argue that without a grasp of emotions, computers will never reach their full ability to assist people.
lead_paragraph: Efforts are under way to expand affective programming, a way of teaching computers to recognize emotions through analyzing facial expressions.
